title: Ziba's Creators Categories
description: Discover all available categories to participate in Ziba's creativity contest

categories.title: AUDIOVISUAL
categories.subtitle: Create impactful visual content
categories.longDescription: Share your best videos, short films, documentaries and audiovisual content that tell unique and exciting stories.

categories.title: DANCE
categories.subtitle: Express rhythm with your body
categories.longDescription: Show your talent in dance, choreography, freestyle and any artistic expression that involves body movement.

categories.title: MUSIC
categories.subtitle: Share your musical passion
categories.longDescription: Upload your covers, original compositions, instrumentals and any musical creation that demonstrates your artistic talent.

categories.title: ART
categories.subtitle: Release your artistic imagination
categories.longDescription: Share your drawings, paintings, digital sculptures, illustrations and any form of visual artistic expression.

categories.title: MEMES
categories.subtitle: Create viral and fun content
categories.longDescription: Share your most creative memes, funny videos, parodies and any content that makes the community laugh.

categories.title: ARTIFICIAL INTELLIGENCE
categories.subtitle: Innovation and creative technology
categories.longDescription: Share your AI creations, generated images, videos with special effects and content that combines technology and creativity.

meta.title: Categories - Ziba's Creators
meta.description: Explore all available categories to participate in Ziba's creativity contest. From audiovisual to artificial intelligence, find your passion.
